{{Actor| | type = Decoration | name = Meat cleaver | class = TableShit10 | game = Hexen | doomednum = 8509 }}[[Classes]]: TableShit10
A bloody meat cleaver with its point set in whatever surface the object is placed upon. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR TableShit10 { {{Property|Radius}} 20 {{Property|Height}} 16 +{{Flag|NOBLOCKMAP}} States { Spawn: TST0 A -1 Stop } }
